00020 namespace Controller
00021 {
00022 
00023 inline int get_world_depth(StateObj* stateObj)
00024 { return getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().current_depth(); }
00025 
00027 inline void world_push(StateObj* stateObj)
00028 {
00029   getQueue(stateObj).getTbq().world_push();
00030   getMemory(stateObj).monotonicSet().before_branch_left();
00031   D_ASSERT(getQueue(stateObj).isQueuesEmpty());
00032   getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().world_push();
00033   getMemory(stateObj).monotonicSet().after_branch_left();
00034   getState(stateObj).getConstraintsToPropagate().push_back(set<AbstractConstraint*>());
00035 }
00036 
00038 inline void world_pop(StateObj* stateObj)
00039 {
00040   D_ASSERT(getQueue(stateObj).isQueuesEmpty());
00041   getQueue(stateObj).getTbq().world_pop();
00042   getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().world_pop();
00043   getMemory(stateObj).monotonicSet().undo();
00044 
00045   vector<set<AbstractConstraint*> >& constraintList = getState(stateObj).getConstraintsToPropagate();
00046   int propagateDepth = get_world_depth(stateObj) + 1;
00047   if(constraintList.size() > propagateDepth)
00048   {
00049     for(set<AbstractConstraint*>::iterator it = constraintList[propagateDepth].begin();
00050         it != constraintList[propagateDepth].end(); it++)
00051     {
00052       (*it)->full_propagate();
00053     }
00054 
00055     if(propagateDepth > 0)
00056     {
00057       constraintList[propagateDepth - 1].insert(constraintList[propagateDepth].begin(), constraintList[propagateDepth].end());
00058     }
00059     constraintList.pop_back();
00060   }
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 inline void world_pop_to_depth(StateObj* stateObj, int depth)
00065 {
00066   // TODO: Speed up this method. It shouldn't call world_pop repeatedly.
00067   // The main problem is this requires adding additions to things like
00068   // monotonic sets I suspect.
00069   D_ASSERT(depth <= get_world_depth(stateObj));
00070   while(depth < get_world_depth(stateObj))
00071     world_pop(stateObj);
00072 }
00073 
00074 inline void world_pop_all(StateObj* stateObj)
00075 {
00076 int depth = getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().current_depth();
00077 for(; depth > 0; depth--)
00078   world_pop(stateObj);
00079 }
00080 
00081 }
00082 
00083 inline void SearchState::addConstraint(AbstractConstraint* c)
00084 {
00085   constraints.push_back(c);
00086   vector<AnyVarRef>* vars = c->get_vars_singleton();
00087   size_t vars_s = vars->size();
00088   for(size_t i = 0; i < vars_s; i++) //note all constraints the var is involved in
00089     (*vars)[i].addConstraint(c);
00090 }
00091 
00092 inline void SearchState::addConstraintMidsearch(AbstractConstraint* c)
00093 {
00094   addConstraint(c);
00095   c->setup();
00096   redoFullPropagate(c);
00097 }
00098 
00099 inline void SearchState::redoFullPropagate(AbstractConstraint* c)
00100 {
00101   constraints_to_propagate[Controller::get_world_depth(stateObj)].insert(c);
00102   c->full_propagate();
00103 }
